Welcome to Nice
//Strings for the food category
Big Ben Open hours: 17:30 – 02.00 Address: 9 rue Alberti, 06000 Nice, France Phone: +33 4 93 80 09 74 Info: One of the most amazing Irish pubs in Nice. Large choice of beers from all around the world, cosy atmosphere and very friendly staff.
Hard Rock Cafe Open hours: 12:00 – 24:00 Address: 5 Promenade des Anglais, 06000 Nice, France Phone: +33 4 93 62 71 80 Info: Imagine sipping a cocktail and eating a Legendary® Burger beside the teal waters of the Mediterranean Sea. This can be your reality when you visit Hard Rock Cafe Nice. Nestled near Vieux Nice along the waterfront on the Promenade des Anglais, the multi-level cafe in Nice, France is a must-see for both visitors and locals.
Gelateria Pinocchio Open Hours: 07:00 – 24:30 Address: 2 Rue Massena, 06000 Nice, France Phone: n/a Info: If you love ice cream, this is the place to be. The shops offers more than 40 different flavours and all of them are homemade. You can try also the best pancakes on the French Riviera, as well as amazing cocktails. They offer also paninis, sandwiches, waffles and slices of very tasty pizzas.
Buffalo Grill Nice Open Hours: 11:30 – 23:30 Address: 2 Avenue des Phocéens, 06300 Nice, France Phone: n/a Info: The bar have an amazing atmosphere, as if you are in a western movie with cowboys and indians. They offer huge range of stacks, ribs and all kind of tasty meat.
//Strings for the sights category Promenade du Paillon Open Hours: 07:00 – 23:00 Address: 2 Avenue des Phocéens, 06300 Nice, France Phone: n/a Info: In the heart of the city covering a distance of 1.2 km, discover the view from the Boscolo Plaza Hotel over the Promenade du Paillon, a new green belt of 12 hectares between the Théâtre National de Nice and the sea.
Parc du Chateau Open Hours: 09:00 – 20:00 Address: Montee du Chateau, Vieux Nice, 06300 Nice, France Phone: n/a Info: This is the place where the ruins of the former Chateau de Nice can be spotted. It is s not just its inner highlights which recommend the park as a tourist must-see, but also the fact the park is one of the best lookouts in Nice, opening the view all the way to Promenade des Anglais and Baie des Anges (west) and Port de Nice (at east).
Marché aux Fleurs Open hours: 06:30 – 17:30 Address: Cours Saleya - 06300 Nice, France Phone: n/a Info: In the shade of pretty striped awnings, hundreds of flowers make eyes at you. It will be hard to resist the multicoloured geraniums, intense mauve fuchsias, dahlias with their anemone-shaped flowers, and the vivid impatiens being sold by the nursery vendors. Anyone strolling by these harmonious floral displays will be able to breathe in the fragrances and enjoy the colourful bouquets, plants and exotic flowers that await them. This is also an ideal opportunity to ask around thirty exhibitors, florists and horticulturists for advice. The market it held every day, from 6 am to 5.30 pm except Mondays, Sunday afternoons and public holidays
Hotel NEGRESCO Open Hours: 24/7 Location: 37 Promenade des Anglais, 06000 Nice, France Phone: +33 4 93 16 64 00 Info: Dating back to 1913, this grand beachfront hotel is an 11-minute walk from the Jardin Albert 1er public park and 15 minutes walk from the Musée des Beaux-Arts de Nice. Stately, colorful rooms blend contemporary and traditional decor. All come with flat-screen TVs and free WiFi; many have sea views. Suites add separate living rooms and furnished balconies. There is a gourmet restaurant and a carousel-themed bistro with a terrace, plus a walnut-paneled bar. Other amenities include conference facilities and access to a private beach (fee). In-room massages are available (surcharge).
//Strings for the Fun category Cinéma Pathé Massena Open Hours: 09:30 – 01:00 Address: 31 Avenue Jean Médecin, 06200 Nice, France Phone:+33 892 69 66 96 Info: The best place to see a movie in the heart of the center in Nice. Most of the titles are with french voice–over but you can still catch some of them with original audio and french subtitles. Of course, you can buy some popcorn and fresh drink inside the cinema.
Nice Bowling Acropolis Open Hours: 13:00 – 02:30 Address: 5 Esplanade Kennedy, 06000 Nice, France Phone:+33 4 93 55 33 11 Info: A great place to practice your bowling skills, there are 10 pool tables, some arcade games and airhokey. While having fun, you can grab some drinks or cocktails from the bar.
High Club Open Hours: 24:00 – 05:00 Address: 45–47 Prom. des Anglais, 06000 Nice, France Phone: +33 7 81 88 42 04 Info: One of the most famous night clubs on the French Riviera. Host to a lot famous artist and Djs from all around the world.
Nikaia Water Sport Open Hours: 09:00 – 17:00 Address: HOTEL BEAU RIVAGE, Quai des États-Unis, 06300 Nice, France Phone:+33 6 09 16 02 16 Info: You like the water, jet skis, motorboats and all kind of summer beach activities – this is the right place for you and your family.
//String for the Shopping category
Fnac Nice Open Hours: 10:00 – 19.30 Address: 44–46 Avenue Jean Médecin, 06008 Nice, France Phone: Phone:+33 825 02 00 20 Info: Here you can find a range of products from audio, books, CDs, computer software and hardware, DVDs, televisions and video games.
Centre Commercial Nicetoile Open Hours: 10:00 – 20:00 Address: 30 Avenue Jean Médecin, 06000 Nice, France Phone: +33 4 92 17 38 17 Info: The one and only mall in the center of Nice. Home to a lot of the famous brands like Addidas, Fossil, Maison du Monde, Ice Watch, Micromania and many other. While shopping, there are places to grab something to eat and drink, to relax or do your nails and hair.
Micromania Open Hours: 10:00 – 19:30 Address: 35 Avenue Jean Médecin, 06000 Nice, France Phone: +33 4 93 88 23 20 Info: The "Nirvana" for all hardcore PC, PS and XBox gamers, anime fans and geeks of all ages. Buy new games, sell your old ones. Get discounts and have fun.
H&M Open Hours: 9:30 – 20:30 Address: 15 Avenue Jean Médecin, 06000 Nice, France Phone: +33 811 65 54 55 Info: Chain retailer supplying on-trend clothing, swimwear, accessories – shoes.
